snippet: In cosplay (short for costume play), fans dress up as comic book, movie and anime characters. Enthusiasts gathered in Manhattan last weekend for New York Comic Con.
abstract: Photographer Fred R Conrad captures images of fans at New York Comic con competing in cosplay, pop cultural phenomenon in which fans dress up as comic book, movie and anime characters; New York Comic Con's contest is billed as most prestigious cosplay competition on East Coast.
lead_paragraph: In cosplay (short for costume play), fans dress up as comic book, movie and anime characters. Enthusiasts gathered in Manhattan last weekend for New York Comic Con.

headline.seo: At New York Comic Con, Fantasy Comes to Life
